name: Blood Money Suit Ascended
description: "Ascend" the Blood Money suit to Hitman 3 (or Hitman 2) suit meshes. This mod author personally recommends the H3 options. They have fancy material shaders for the jacket and pants.

options.name: Do not replace
options.tooltip: Don't replace the Blood Money suit?

options.tooltip: Install the H3 suit. Mod author's personal recommendation.

options.name: H3 - Buttoned
options.tooltip: Install the H3 suit with buttoned jacket.

options.name: H3 - Suburban
options.tooltip: Install the H3 suit with buttoned jacket Suburban Suit style. Wider lapels, pockets are lower down and exposes less of the shirt, tie and belt.

options.tooltip: Install the H3 suit without jacket.

options.name: H3 - No jacket, holster
options.tooltip: Install the H3 suit without jacket, and with shoulder holster.
